Third party code

This site uses some open-source code from other people to avoid having to code a lot of complex functions.

In this page, I have listed all of open-source libraries that have been used to make this website, as well as all HTTP APIs that are accessed during the usage of the website.

Open-source frameworks

  • jhlywa/chess.js: This library helps get the fen of each position and evaluate the position on board

HTTP APIs

  • lichess.org/api: Get lichess users games
  • api.chess.com/pub/player/: Get chess.com users games
  • mychessopening.com/api/openings: Get if a position is a book-known position

Other repositories

  • fatorius/Clusterer: Used to cluster all of the openings

References

  • Stockfish Evaluation Guide: Used as reference to recreate Stockfish's static evaluation function
